source.interface:
* This interface represents the extent of a planar region or of the surface of * a solid measured in square units. The system unit for this quantity * is "m²" (square meter). Jean-Marie Dautelle 1.0, January 14, 2006
* Holds the SI unit (Système International d'Unités) for this quantity.
<declaration type="Unit" name="UNIT" />
